bibl.title: 19-26 maggio 1983. Volume primo: Papirologia generale; - Volume secondo: Papirologia letteraria. Testi e documenti egiziani; - Volume terzo: Papirologia documentaria. Papirologia araba.

publisher.orgName: Centro Internazionale per lo Studio dei Papiri Ercolanesi

bibl.note: Les communications suivantes n'apparaissent que sous la forme de résumés. - Vol. I: Alan K. Bowman, Wilcken's "Grundzüge und Chrestomathie", p. 175 (plans for a new edition); - Revel Coles, Oxyrhynchus, 1981, p. 175; - Denise Jourdan Hemmerdinger, Le POxy. 1624 de Platon et les notations musicales dites "ekphonétiques", p. 82 (à paraître dans le "Corpus dei Papiri filosofici greci e latini"); - Hassan Ragab, A New Theorem about the Adhesion of Papyrus Strips to Make a Papyrus Sheet, p. 81; - Idem, A Project to Establish an International Papyrus Conservation and Restoration Centre and a New Method for Papyrus Restoration, pp. 81-82. - Vol. II: Walter Eric Harold Cockle, A Papyrus of the First Treatise on Rhetoric Attributed to Aelius Aristides, p. 373; - Bruno Gentili, Interpretazione di Alceo, POxy. 2307, Fr. 17, col. II = Fr. 306 i Voigt, p. 333; - Knut Kleve, A Possible Method of Unrolling Carbonized Scrolls, pp. 379-380; - Timothy T. Renner, A Prose Mythographical-Geographical Text on Sicily and the Islands of Aeolus, p. 373; - Piero Treves, Il papiro di Cornelio Gallo, p. 335. - Vol. III: Raymond Bogaert, Les banques affermées ptolémaïques, p. 1015; - Edda Bresciani, Aspetti del bilinguismo greco-demotico negli ostraka di Medinet Madi, pp. 917-918; - Eadem, Demotico e greco nei testi ufficiali egiziani d'età tolemaica, p. 1391; - Françoise Dunand, Pratiques funéraires en Égypte romaine: les nécrotaphes de Kysis, p. 1016; - Farouk Farid, "Euchomai ... para tois theois": Evaluation of a Religious Practice, p. 1017; - Inger Louise Forselv, Fragment of a Memorandum or Petition from Priests, I A.D., p. 1064; - Evangelos Karabélias, La forme de la "testatio" ("ekmarturion") matrimoniale en droit romain classique et post-classique, p. 1275; - Ranon Katzoff, "Defensor civitatis". Papyri in the Aid of Rabbinics, p. 1064; - Royce L.B. Morris, PDuke 5: An Unpublished Papyrus from the Duke University Collection, p. 918; - Orsamus M. Pearl, An Unpublished Text: PMich. Inv. No. 5806, Copy of a Sale, p. 1063; - Rosario Pintaudi, Papyri Graecae Wessely Pragenses, p. 918; - Sarah B. Pomeroy, Copronyms and the Exposure of Infants in Egypt, p. 1341 [à paraître dans: R.S. Bagnall and W.V. Harris (Edd.), Studies in Memory of A. Arthur Schiller]; - Dominic W. Rathbone, The Heroninos Archive and the Estate of Aurelius Appianus, p. 915; - Jane Rowlandson, Where were the "demosioi georgoi"?, p. 1063; - John Shelton, The Archive of Nepheros, p. 917; - Maria Sirivianou, Stereotyped Byzantine Formulae, p. 1342; - J. David Thomas, Strategos and Exactor in Early Byzantine Egypt, p. 1065.

bibl.title: Patrice Cauderlier
bibl.note: C.R. par Patrice Cauderlier, REG 98 (1985) pp. 410-414.
